column5: My mother in law has gone to glory last evening. Lung and brain cancer.
My and J's condolences. All I can say is that I hope it was fast as I suspect that that combination would be painful   not only for her but also for the people left behind.  Stay strong and be well.
Our condolences in you loss.  Nasty, nasty crap for sure
Sincerest condolences Albert.
It was surprisingly gentle, and pain free. Our family is happy that her 82 year journey is over and that she is with her God in glory right now. Thank you for the expressions of sympathy everyone.
Im sorry . Stay strong and together.  Darren
My condolences as well ! Any form of cancer seems terrible.
Albert,  Deepest condolences to your family and yourself from Ticha and I.  Johnny D
Sorry to hear this Albert...
My condolences.
Sad news Albert. Even at the long age of 82,it,s no way to go.  Our  condolences.to you and your whole family.
Very sorry to hear this Albert
Sorry for your loss.  S.
My sincere condolences, Albert. I hope she went peacefully.

82's not a bad haul Albert.  Brain and lung hits real close to home here these days, having a 28 year old currently in that fight so took me awhile to respond, but we offer our deepest condolences at this time.  Wayne and Leah
I'm sorry that I caused you any distress, it was not my intent Wayne.
My condolences Al.
Deepest sympathy my friend. I know exactly how you feel.    Paul
You have both my, and, Juli's condolences Albert.  We'll all continue the fight to beat the disease.  Take care.
My condolences Albert.
82 is a pretty good run but it's never easy loosing anyone and anytime.  My condolences to you and your family Albert.
My condolences to you and your family Albert.
